TunableTuple.name: ECO_FOOTPRINT_STATE_DATA
TunableTuple.description: Tuning that defines the different Eco Footprint States, their effects, and the thresholds on the lot/street footprint statistics that determine when a street or lot is considered green, neutral, or industrial.

Tunable.name: additional_footprint_change_on_state_change
Tunable.display: Additional Footprint Change On State Change
Tunable.description: A value that is multiplied by the direction of the street footprint's convergence and added to the street footprint whenever the state changes. The purpose of this value is to prevent rapid flickering between states when the street eco footprint value is borderline by nudging the eco footprint further in its current direction.

Tunable.name: industrial_threshold
Tunable.description: The number at or above which a street or lot is considered industrial.

Tunable.description: A reference to the lot-level statistic. The aggregate of all lot footprints on a street will determine the convergence point of the street's eco footprint.

TunableTuple.name: STREET_CONVERGENCE_UPDATE_TUNING
TunableTuple.description: Tuning that determines how the street footprint convergence is calculated.

TunableList.name: convergence_rate_tuning
TunableList.description: Mapping that maps the convergence direction to modifiers to apply to the rate of convergence when converging in that direction.

TunableTuple.name: per_lot_modifiers
TunableTuple.description: Tested multipliers applied on a per lot basis to the convergence rate of the street's eco footprint. Picked Zone ID will be the zone_id of the zone in question.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableList.name: played_lot_weight
TunableList.description: A curve that defines the impact of a played lot on the street footprint's convergence relative to unplayed lots. The way we define a played lot is any lot with a household that has been played. Unplayed lots are everything else. The input to the curve is the percentage of played lots on the street. The output should be a value between 0 and 1 that weights the relative impact of played lots.

Tunable.name: x
Tunable.description: x component

Tunable.name: y
Tunable.description: y component

TunableTuple.name: tested_sums
TunableTuple.description: Tested sums added to the convergence point of the street's eco footprint. These are added after the tested multipliers are applied to the convergence point.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifiers are applied.

TunableList.name: modifiers
TunableList.description: A list of modifiers to add to Base Value.

Tunable.name: modifier
Tunable.description: The value to apply add to Base Value if the associated tests pass. Can be negative

Tunable.name: multiply_by_count
Tunable.description: If enabled, will multiply the final test result in tests by the numeric result of the test if the tests pass. This only applies for tests that return a count. If you aren't sure if your test returns a count, ask your GPE and they can tell you. Note: This only works on the last test in the test list. If you aren't sure if your tuning is correct, please try it out in game to verify that it behaves correctly.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for the modifier to be applied.
